thread.title: Police investigating 'possible homicide' after West Branch standoff
thread.title_full: Police investigating 'possible homicide' after West Branch standoff

author: Michael Kransz | mkransz@mlive.com
title: Police investigating 'possible homicide' after West Branch standoff
text: The man, who barricaded himself in a hotel room Saturday morning, told police and others he had recently killed someone at a specific location in Mills Township. Police have found a body at the location the man gave. A homicide investigation is underway.
